question: Which two prevent a servlet from handling requests? (Choose two.)

options.A: The servlet’s init method returns a non-zero status.
options.B: The servlet’s init method throws a ServletException.
options.C: The servlet’s init method sets the ServletResponse’s content length to 0.
options.D: The servlet’s init method sets the ServletResponse’s content type to null.
options.E: The servlet’s init method does NOT return within a time period defined by the servlet container.
